### ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰å¼·åº¦ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚«ãƒ¼

```{python}
def check_password_strength(password):
    """ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®å¼·åº¦ã‚’ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°"""
    
    # åˆæœŸè¨­å®š
    score = 0

    # é•·ã•ã‚’ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
    if len(password) >= 8:

    # æ–‡å­—ã®ç¨®é¡ã‚’ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
    has_upper = any(c.isupper() for c in password)
    has_lower = any(c.islower() for c in password)
    has_digit = any(c.isdigit() for c in password)
    has_special = any(c in "!@#$%^&*" for c in password)
    
    if has_upper:
        score += 1
    else:
        feedback.append("å¤§æ–‡å­—ã‚’å«ã‚ã¦ãã ã•ã„")
        
    if has_lower:
        score += 1
    else:
        feedback.append("å°æ–‡å­—ã‚’å«ã‚ã¦ãã ã•ã„")
        
    if has_digit:
        score += 1
    else:
        feedback.append("æ•°å­—ã‚’å«ã‚ã¦ãã ã•ã„")
        
    if has_special:
        score += 1
    else:
        feedback.append("ç‰¹æ®Šæ–‡å­—ã‚’å«ã‚ã¦ãã ã•ã„")
    
    # å¼·åº¦ã‚’è©•ä¾¡
    if score >= 4:
        strength = "å¼·ã„"
    elif score >= 3:
        strength = "æ™®é€š"
    else:
        strength = "å¼±ã„"
    
    return strength, feedback

# ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆä¾‹
test_passwords = ["123", "password", "Password1", "MyStrongP@ss1"]

for password in test_passwords:
```
